Supplementary Table 2.
List of the genes located at 172-176 Mb in Chr 1, with the fold- change in the expression between the C168-176 and B6 if significant.

For the genes with very low expression in bone,  it was not possible to determine accurately the expression between the sublines and the B6 control mice.
